Article.Title: Transfers or disclosures not authorised by Union law

Content.Description: Any judgment of a court or tribunal and any decision of an administrative authority of a third country requiring a controller or processor to transfer or disclose personal data may only be recognised or enforceable in any manner if based on an international agreement.

Conditions.Condition: The agreement must be a mutual legal assistance treaty.

Content.Note: This is without prejudice to other grounds for transfer pursuant to this Chapter.
